Module BayesianClassifier
Package fileIO

Class Dataset

java.lang.Object
fileIO.Dataset
public class Dataset
extends java.lang.Object
The class is used to save information and all instances of the input file
Author:
Group 20

      Method to get the Arraylist of the ri values of each attribute.
      Returns:
      ri_val Arraylist of ri values with position 0 to attibutes X1, 1 to X2, etc.
